alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 9:10AM CDT until August 07 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Fayette County in west Tennessee... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 910 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Arlington, or 15 miles northeast of Cordova, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Somerville, Warren, Oakland, Gallaway, Williston, Braden, Yum Yum, Fayette Corners, Laconia, Belmont, Longtown, Moorman, Taylor Chapel, Lambert, Miller, Hickory Withe, Powers and Griffen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
